name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Thomas Michael LUTZ-MORRISON, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Thomas Michael LUTZ-MORRISON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of April, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
(1) Whether [Petitioner] is subject to lifetime reporting requirements pursuant to 42 Pa.C.S.A[.] § 9799.15.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
112 A.3d 1209
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Thomas Michael LUTZ-MORRISON, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 8, 2015.
